thread.title: Oscars auditors apologise for Best Picture mix-up
thread.title_full: Oscars auditors apologise for Best Picture mix-up - Channel NewsAsia

author: - AFP/xk
title: Oscars auditors apologise for Best Picture mix-up
text:
HOLLYWOOD: PriceWaterhouseCoopers, the accounting firm responsible for tabulating Oscar ballots, apologised for an "error" in the presentation of the best picture award on Sunday (Feb 26), saying Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway were handed the wrong envelope.
The mix-up saw the Oscar incorrectly given to musical "La La Land" before producers corrected the mistake, and "Moonlight" was handed the prize.
"We are currently investigating how this could have happened, and deeply regret that this occurred," PriceWaterhouseCoopers said in a statement.
- AFP/xk
